item.title: Israeli-American Edan Alexander was released as part of efforts to reach a new ceasefire deal, Hamas said. The 21-year-old had been serving in the Israeli army when he was captured by Hamas on 7 October 2023. #MiddleEast #Gaza #Israel #MiddleEastNews #Eda
